page.title: 19Come to Beverley
page.content: If you visit Beverley you could do a lot of things. On a wet day you could go to the new swimming baths. Or if you like visiting interesting places you could go and see the Army Transport Museum near the playing field. On a lovely hot day you could stroll round this market town and look at the historic buildings like the North Bar,St. Marys Church or the Minster. The Minster took two hundred years to build from 1220-1420. You can go walking or riding on the Westwood,play games or go in the woods and swing on the branches and climb the trees. Beverley also has a golf course and another area of common land called Swinemoor. If you have a car you could go over the nearby Humber bridge,it is a very good view.
